name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clari Groove for G-Suite and Microsoft 365

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sales Engagement Platform For Salesforce, G-Suite, And Microsoft 365 Users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clari Groove is a market-leading sales engagement platform that enables sales leaders to execute their strategy in a smart, adaptive way. With Clari Groove, revenue leaders can use automation to do more with less, driving greater efficiency and effectiveness across the customer lifecycle. 

Clari Groove enables more than 75,000 users at ADP, Google, Uber, iHeartMedia, Capital One, and other large enterprises to be more efficient and effective. Clari Groove has ranked #1 in enterprise customer satisfaction on G2 for four consecutive years and has been named one of the Inc. 5000 fastest-growing privately held companies in the U.S. since 2020. To learn more, visit https://www.clari.com/products/groove/
